tmux # ~/.tmux.conf set-environment -g PATH "/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin" set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-battery' set -g @plugin 'tmux-plugins/tmux-open' set -g prefix C-a unbind C-b unbind C-f bind C-a send-prefix set -g base-index 1 setw -g pane-base-index 1 set -g mouse on set -g status on set -g status-bg black set -g status-fg white set-option -g status-position top set -g status-left "#S" set -g status-right "#[bold,fg=#a38464]#{battery_percentage} #[bg=#a38464,fg=black]%a %d %b #[fg=black]#[fg=grey,bg=black]%H:%M:%S" set -g set-titles on set -g set-titles-string "tmux #T" setw -g mode-keys vi set -g default-terminal "screen-256color" bind r source-file ~/.
